verses.verse: ( A Thankful Heart) לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David. אוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> ’ō·wḏ·ḵā I give You thanks בְכָל־ <WH3605> ḇə·ḵāl- with all לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib·bî my heart; נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> ne·ḡeḏ before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm the gods אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH2167> ’ă·zam·mə·re·kā I sing Your praises.

אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה <WH7812> ’eš·ta·ḥă·weh I bow down אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- toward הֵיכַ֪ל <WH1964> hê·ḵal temple קָדְשְׁךָ֡ <WH6944> qāḏ·šə·ḵā Your holy וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> wə·’ō·w·ḏeh and give thanks אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שְׁמֶ֗ךָ <WH8034> šə·me·ḵā to Your name עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- for חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> ḥas·də·ḵā Your loving devotion וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- and אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <WH571> ’ă·mit·te·ḵā Your faithfulness; כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- You הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ <WH1431> hiḡ·dal·tā have exalted עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kā·lō·ši- all else. שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> mə·ḵā Your name אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH565> ’im·rā·ṯe·ḵā and Your word

בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm On the day קָ֭רָֽאתִי <WH7121> qā·rā·ṯî I called, וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> wat·ta·‘ă·nê·nî You answered me; תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי <WH7292> tar·hi·ḇê·nî You emboldened me בְנַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> ḇə·nap̄·šî my soul. ( Or You emboldened me with strength in my soul) עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> ‘ōz [and] strengthened

יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> yō·w·ḏū·ḵā will give You thanks, יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- All מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> mal·ḵê- the kings אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ of the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî when שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> mə·‘ū they hear אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> ’im·rê- the words פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> p̄î·ḵā of Your mouth.

וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ <WH7891> wə·yā·šî·rū They will sing בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> bə·ḏar·ḵê of the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî for גָ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> ḡā·ḏō·wl is great. כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> kə·ḇō·wḏ the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD

כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- Though רָ֣ם <WH7311> rām is on high, יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD וְשָׁפָ֣ל <WH8217> wə·šā·p̄āl to the lowly; יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> yir·’eh He attends וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ <WH1364> wə·ḡā·ḇō·ah but the proud מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק <WH4801> mim·mer·ḥāq from afar. יְיֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> yə·yê·ḏā‘ He knows

אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If אֵלֵ֤ךְ׀ <WH1980> ’ê·lêḵ I walk בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> bə·qe·reḇ in the midst צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> ṣā·rāh of trouble, תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי <WH2421> tə·ḥay·yê·nî You preserve me עַ֤ל <WH5921> ‘al from אַ֣ף <WH639> ’ap̄ the anger אֹ֭יְבַי <WH341> ’ō·yə·ḇay of my foes; תִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> tiš·laḥ You extend יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> yā·ḏe·ḵā Your hand, וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> wə·ṯō·wō·šî·‘ê·nî saves me. יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> yə·mî·ne·ḵā and Your right hand

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִגְמֹ֪ר <WH1584> yiḡ·mōr will fulfill בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י <WH1157> ba·‘ă·ḏî [His purpose] for me. יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, חַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> ḥas·də·ḵā Your loving devotion לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām endures forever — מַעֲשֵׂ֖י <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śê the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> yā·ḏe·ḵā of Your hands. אַל־ <WH408> ’al- do not תֶּֽרֶף׃ <WH7503> te·rep̄ abandon
